currentDoc: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.


Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.


Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
 They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.

 They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.

Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
 They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain. As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.

 They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain. As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.


But magical power comes with a price.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.


Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
 They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain. As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.


But magical power comes with a price.
 Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...

A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
 He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.

sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 


Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

 They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain. As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
 Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?


A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
 He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 


Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
 If he succeeds, the world will be reborn. The stakes have n

 They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain. As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
 Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
  If he succeeds, the world will be reborn.  The stakes have never been higher.

  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
  If he succeeds, the world will be reborn.  The stakes have never been higher. 

What asher does not know, however, i

  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long.

f he fails, he will die.

  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
  If he succeeds, the world will be reborn.  The stakes have never been higher. 

What Asher does not know, however, is that his Shard is of particular val

Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
  If he succeeds, the world will be reborn.  The stakes have never been higher.

 the magical one that has been lost for so long.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power.  But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect.  When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power.  But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect.  When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power.  But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect.  When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
  If he succeeds, the world will be reborn.  The stakes have never been higher.  Asher longs to use the Shards power to defeat the aliens.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power.  But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect.  When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.

A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
  If he succeeds, the world will be reborn.  The stakes have never been higher.  Asher longs to use the Shards power to defeat the aliens.

What Asher does not know, however, is that, in their own twisted way, the aliens see themselves as beneficial beings. They try

Humans once wielded formidable magical power.  But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect.  When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power.  But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect.  When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?

Humans once wielded formidable magical power.  But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect.  When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power.  But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect.  When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
  If he succeeds, the world will be reborn.  The stakes have never been higher.  Asher longs to use the Shards power to defeat the aliens.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power.  But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect.  When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
  If he succeeds, the world will be reborn.  The stakes have never been higher.  Asher longs to use the Shards power to defeat the aliens.

What Asher does not know, however, is that, in their own w the aliens see themselves as beneficial beings. They try to heal the world, by culling the humans. They want to restore the humans connection with mana. They are trying to do good, by their own twisted standard.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power.  But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect.  When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
Unusual gems and magical talismans are appearing all over the world.
  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
  If he succeeds, the world will be reborn.  The stakes have never been higher.  Asher longs to use the Shards power to defeat the aliens.

What Asher does not know, however, is that, in their own way, the aliens see themselves as beneficial beings. They try to heal the world, by culling the humans. They want to restore the humans connection with Mana. They are trying to do good, by their own twisted standard. 
The aliens are not all bad, but the humans are not all good.
 There are also

  They're called "Shards" and those who have them can draw upon the vast stores of magic energy they contain.  As more and more of these Shards are found, the magic within them is being used to resurrect a world that was lost during the great war.
Mgical power comes with a price.
  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
  If he succeeds, the world will be reborn.  The stakes have never been higher.  Asher longs to use the Shards power to defeat the aliens.

What Asher does not know, however, is that, in their own way, the aliens see themselves as beneficial beings. They try to heal the world, by culling the humans. They want to restore the humans connection with Mana. They are trying to do good, by their own twisted standard. 
The aliens are not all bad, but the humans are not all good.
 There are also corrupt humans who want to use Man

  Every Shard has a human host, and as the power of magic works to recreate the world as it once was, these hosts begin to die...Will humanity make the tradeoff?
A young man named Asher is drawn to a mysterious Shard that is accompanied by an ethereal woman.
  He is the latest in a long line of hosts and he is about to discover his true purpose.
sher's destiny is to protect every Shard and their hosts, as well as serve as one of the last links between our world and
 the magical one that has been lost for so long. 

Now he must learn to master his powers, and lead humanity into a new age of magic.
 
f he fails, he will die.
  If he succeeds, the world will be reborn.  The stakes have never been higher.  Asher longs to use the Shards power to defeat the aliens.

What Asher does not know, however, is that, in their own way, the aliens see themselves as beneficial beings. They try to heal the world, by culling the humans. They want to restore the humans connection with Mana. They are trying to do good, by their own twisted standard. 
The aliens are not all bad, but the humans are not all good.
 There are also corrupt humans who want to use Mana to control others.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power.  But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect.  When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
